title: Request: Screenshot naming
author: adambird79
body_snippet:
Request to allow the screenshot default naming to be changed to allow naming screenshots %connectionname%(0-9).png 

so screenshots names would be something like: 

server1_01.png
server1_02.png
server2_01.png

Thanks

iterations.description: Screenshot functionality was removed in v1.77.2 (#2011). This request is accepted as an enhancement to restore a simplified 'Take Screenshot' feature with automatic, configurable naming (e.g., ConnectionName_Timestamp) to replace the deprecated manager.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Screenshot functionality was removed in v1.77.2 (#2011). This request is accepted as an enhancement to restore a simplified 'Take Screenshot' feature with automatic, configurable naming (e.g., ConnectionName_Timestamp) to replace the deprecated manager.
Approach: Restore the 'Take Screenshot' context menu option in ConnectionTab. Implement logic to capture the screen and automatically save the file to a configured 'Screenshots' directory using a timestamp-based naming pattern.
